name: Port Vell
address: Pg. de Joan de Borbó, 64, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona
description: A beautiful urban port perfect for iconics views.

name: Barrio Gótico
description: The most emblematic and artistic district of the city.

name: Montjuic
description: Historic hill with cable car, harbor views and a park with a castle and museums.

name: Tibidabo
description: Mountain with an imposing cathedral, an amusement park with Ferris wheel and panoramic views of Barcelona

name: La Barceloneta
description: Barceloneta is a seaside neighborhood where locals come to surf and sunbathe on the beach of Sant Sebastià.

name: Casa Batlló
description: Building designed by Gaudí with a rooftop terrace, a fantastic facade that simulates the curves of a dragon and a museum.

name: Aquarium Barcelona
address: Moll d'Espanya del Port Vell, s/n, Barcelona
description: Visit L'Aquàrium de Barcelona and discover the amazing world of aquatic life. Enjoy family activities, shark dives, and learn about environmental education and conservation.
